This page is automatically generated by the generate_collection.rb plugin, based on the _layouts/animal.html template.

Use the _config.yml to specify the rules for generating pages like this one (including name and template).

In the template, you have access to all the fields defined in data for the record, like, for instance:

page.language: Kuuku-Ya'u

page.animal_name_in_language: pata

page.animal_common_name: common death adder

Additionally, you also have access to page.name, which is the filename of the page, that is: .
